Description: Benjamin Franklin Pass and P&W Waste Oil Services Inc. were sentenced in federal court in Raleigh, North Carolina. Pass was sentenced to 42 months in prison and ordered to pay restitution in the amount of $21,373,143.38 for clean-up costs associated with the environmental contamination at his business and an additional $538,857 to the Internal Revenue Service for federal income taxes he failed to pay between 2002 and 2011.
